i1.name: Living_Battery
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Zeri''' absorbs the energy of {{tip|shield|shields}} she damages, shielding herself equal to 60% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt to the shield. Each instance of shield gained by ''Living Battery'' lasts for 3 seconds.
{{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever '''Zeri''' receives a {{tip|shield}}, she gains {{sti|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Zeri absorbs the energy of shields she damages, shielding herself equal to 60% of the post-mitigation damage dealt to the shield. Each instance of shield gained by Living Battery lasts for 3 seconds.
Innate: Whenever Zeri receives a shield, she gains 10% bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
i1.notes:
* '''Zeri''' will grant herself a normal shield, even when dealing damage to [[Shield#Physical shields|physical shields]] or [[Shield#Magic shields|magic shields]].
* Damage dealt by [[summoner spell]]s to shields do not trigger ''Living Battery''.{{bug|2}}

q1.name: Burst_Fire
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Zeri's''' {{tip|slow}} application from a {{ai|Basic Attack 2|Zeri|charged}} basic attack has its strength increased.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Zeri''' fires a burst of 7 rounds in the target direction that each deal {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit.

''Burst Fire's'' projectile is treated as a [[basic attack]]: it hits any enemy unit a typical basic attack can; deals {{tip|basic damage}}; can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}}|critical damage}} '''bonus''' damage; and applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness once on each target struck. ''Burst Fire's'' {{sti|cooldown}} and cast time scale down with {{as|attack speed}}, with the maximum of {{fd|1.5}} attacks per second. 60% of {{as|attack speed}} in excess of the cap is converted into {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Zeri's slow application from a Zeri's charged basic attack has its strength increased.
Active: Zeri fires a burst of 7 rounds in the target direction that each deal physical damage to the first enemy hit.
Burst Fire's projectile is treated as a basic attack: it hits any enemy unit a typical basic attack can; deals basic damage; can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) bonus damage; and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness once on each target struck. Burst Fire's cooldown and cast time scale down with attack speed, with the maximum of 1.5 attacks per second. 60% of attack speed in excess of the cap is converted into bonus attack damage.
leveling: {{st|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 30}} {{as|(+ 110% AD)}}|Physical Damage per Bullet|{{ap|10/7 to 30/7|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110/7|round=2}}% AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Burst Fire'' is automatically learned with her first skill point upon spawning.
* ''Burst Fire'' does not trigger {{iis|Tear of the Goddess}} {{nie|Mana Charge}}.
* ''Burst Fire's'' cooldown is not reduced by {{ii|Navori Quickblades}} whenever it critically strikes.
* {{cais|Tantrum|Amumu}}, {{cais|Nimble Fighter|Fizz}}, and {{cais|Eclipse|Leona}} flat damage reduction apply to '''each''' of the 7 instances of damage from ''Burst Fire''.
** {{iis|Warden's Mail}} flat damage reduction and cap only apply to the first instance of damage.
** {{iis|Guardian's Horn}} flat damage reduction only applies to the first instance of damage, but handles it as damage-over-time (reduced to 25% effectiveness).
* ''Burst Fire'' still counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Burst Fire'' can hit '''all''' enemy units that a basic attack would be able to target. This does include [[jungle plants]], [[structure]]s, and [[ward]]s.
** Wards will only be hit once by ''Burst Fire''. [[Stealth#Stealthed_traps_and_wards|Stealthed wards and traps]] will not be hit.
* If ''Burst Fire'' hits an enemy while '''Zeri''' is not visible to enemies, the area around her (400 units) will be revealed for {{fd|4.5}} seconds.
* ''Burst Fire'' rolls {{tip|critical strike}} for all rounds as well as the additional physical damage dealt when '''Zeri''' is {{ai|Lightning Crash|Zeri|Overcharged}}.
* ''Burst Fire'' is parried by {{tip|dodge}} and {{tip|block}}.
** {{tip|Blind}} causes ''Burst Fire'' to cast in a random direction. The rounds will still deal damage to enemies hit.
* ''Burst Fire's'' rounds are fired each in the target direction from where '''Zeri''' is at the time.
* '''Only''' attack speed granted by being {{ai|Lightning Crash|Zeri|Overcharged}} can exceed the cap of {{fd|1.5}}.
** {{ri|Hail of Blades}} and {{ri|Lethal Tempo}} do not allow '''Zeri''' to exceed her attack speed cap.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* ''Burst Fire'' uses a modified icon when empowered by {{ai|Spark Surge|Zeri}} ([[File:Zeri Burst Fire 2.png|20px|link=]]) and {{ai|Lightning Crash|Zeri}} ([[File:Zeri Burst Fire 3.png|20px|link=]]) as well as both ([[File:Zeri Burst Fire 4.png|20px|link=]]).

w1.name: Ultrashock_Laser
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Zeri''' fires an electric pulse in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for a duration.

If the pulse collides with terrain, it transforms into a laser in a line from the point of impact that grants {{tip|sight}} of the area for {{fd|1.75}} seconds and fires after {{fd|0.75}} seconds, applying the same effects to all enemies caught within.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zeri fires an electric pulse in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and slows them for a duration.

If the pulse collides with terrain, it transforms into a laser in a line from the point of impact that grants sight of the area for 1.75 seconds and fires after 0.75 seconds, applying the same effects to all enemies caught within.
w1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} for the pulse and {{tip|area damage}} for the laser.
* The pulse missile is blocked by {{tip|projectile|projectile-interception}} effects but not the laser.
* ''Ultrashock Laser'' interacts with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].

e1.name: Spark_Surge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zeri''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the target direction. Afterwards, she energizes her next 3 casts of {{ai|Burst Fire 2|Zeri|Burst Fire}} within 6 seconds, causing them to pierce through enemies, though dealing reduced damage after the first and not applying attack effects nor {{stil|life steal}} to secondary targets. This damage is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.

'''Zeri''' will dash farther across terrain if ''Spark Surge'' was cast within 50 units of any, gaining {{tip|unobstructed vision}} of the surrounding 800 units and {{tip|sight|revealing}} herself while there are enemy champions within 800 units of her.<!--seriously how do I even write this? Does the average user know what 3000 units is? Also is it 3000 units for the whole dash or just the wall?-->
''Spark Surge's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 1 second for every champion '''Zeri''' hits with {{ai|Basic Attack 2|Zeri|charged}} basic attacks or abilities.

''Spark Surge'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Zeri's''' basic attack timer and {{ais|Burst Fire|Zeri}} cooldown. '''Zeri''' can cast {{ai|Ultrashock Laser|Zeri}} and {{ai|Lightning Crash|Zeri}} while {{tip|dash|dashing}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zeri dashes in the target direction. Afterwards, she energizes her next 3 casts of Zeri's Burst Fire within 6 seconds, causing them to pierce through enemies, though dealing reduced damage after the first and not applying attack effects nor Unknown value: stil / life steal to secondary targets. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Zeri will dash farther across terrain if Spark Surge was cast within 50 units of any, gaining unobstructed vision of the surrounding 800 units and revealing herself while there are enemy champions within 800 units of her.
Spark Surge's cooldown is reduced by 1 second for every champion Zeri hits with Zeri's charged basic attacks or abilities.
Spark Surge resets Zeri's basic attack timer and Zeri's Burst Fire cooldown. Zeri can cast Zeri's Ultrashock Laser and Zeri's Lightning Crash while dashing.
e1.notes:
* ''Spark Surge's'' extended dash travels based on the thickness of the terrain, up to a maximum distance.

r1.name: Lightning_Crash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zeri''' discharges a nova of electricity around her, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies.

If ''Lightning Crash'' hits at least one enemy champion, '''Zeri''' becomes ''Overcharged'' for 6 seconds, and gains 4 [[stack]]s of ''Overcharge'' per champion hit. Each stack grants her {{as|{{fd|1.5}}% '''bonus''' movement speed}}. She gains a stack of ''Overcharge'' each time she hits an enemy champion with a {{ai|Basic Attack 2|Zeri|charged}} basic attack or ability, refreshing the duration of ''Overcharge'' by 2 seconds in the process.

While ''Overcharged'', '''Zeri''' gains {{tt|{{sti|{{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}|Can exceed Zeri's attack speed cap}} and empowers {{ai|Burst Fire 3|Zeri|Burst Fire}} to deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} once per target per cast and instead fire 3 rounds over a 20% shorter cast time that are electrified and travelling with increased speed. These rounds deal the {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to the target struck and the closest {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets. Secondary targets are dealt {{as|25% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}, which can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|18.75|25}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}. The {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zeri discharges a nova of electricity around her, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.
If Lightning Crash hits at least one enemy champion, Zeri becomes Overcharged for 6 seconds, and gains 4 stacks of Overcharge per champion hit. Each stack grants her 1.5% bonus movement speed. She gains a stack of Overcharge each time she hits an enemy champion with a Zeri's charged basic attack or ability, refreshing the duration of Overcharge by 2 seconds in the process.
While Overcharged, Zeri gains 30% bonus attack speed and empowers Zeri's Burst Fire to deal bonus magic damage once per target per cast and instead fire 3 rounds over a 20% shorter cast time that are electrified and travelling with increased speed. These rounds deal the bonus magic damage to the target struck and the closest visible enemy, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets. Secondary targets are dealt 25% AD physical damage, which can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage. The bonus magic damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
r1.notes:
* '''Zeri''' can move during ''Lightning Crash's'' cast time.
* There is no limit as to how many ''Overcharge'' stacks '''Zeri''' can have.
* Applies {{tip|area damage}} for the nova and {{tip|proc damage}} for the bonus magic damage and physical damage.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} blocks ''Lightning Crash's'' initial nova but does not prevent '''Zeri''' from becoming ''Overcharged''.
** It does not block {{ais|Burst Fire|Zeri}} electricity chain.
* {{tip|Clone|Clones}} count for granting ''Overcharge''.
* ''Lightning Crash's'' and {{ais|Spark Surge|Zeri}} empowerments to {{ai|Burst Fire 4|Zeri|Burst Fire}} can combine together.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
